rules_text:
When Trash Trawler enters the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, choose one –
• Return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Rediscover a permanent card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a permanent card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
